About Me

👋 Hi there, my name is Beau (pronounced like go). Here is a bit if information about me.

  • 🌆 I live in Oakland California.

  • 🏢 I work at Slack as a full stack web developer.
  • 🧑‍🎓 I enjoy learning about all levels of the tech stack -- everything from assembly to JavaScript.
  • 🌞 I spend my spare time in the outdoors.
